1.title: Un Gran Lamento
1.plot: A sinister organization called The Brotherhood seeks to take power using Federico Marquez and Capadocia to achieve its aims. Teresa Lagos will be forced to come back from the dead.

2.title: El fruto de tu vientre
2.plot: Federico Marquez is initiated into The Brotherhood and Teresa confronts her new fate. Inside Capadocia, Valeria looks on helplessly as a baby dies.

3.title: Aceite de la Uncion
3.plot: Teresa finds out the plans of The Brotherhood and while they entail sacrifices for Federico, The Brotherhood and Doctor Alós must eliminate other obstacles in their way.

4.title: Los Escogidos
4.plot: As Don Fernando's team of resistance fighters get organized, The Brotherhood sets out to sow fear and violence in the streets. Hiram Alós finds the perfect assassin. Federico and Don Angel suspect that Teresa may still be alive.

5.title: Destruye, (Lo que te duele Matalo)
5.plot: Two opposing forces are about to collide in Capadocia: Doctor Alos' monstrous scheme and Teresa Lagos' wily strategy to make sure it fails. As Federico Marquez' fame grows, the Brotherhood's dark machinations claim yet another victim.

6.title: Las Vertientes de la salvacion
6.plot: HD. 'The Wells of Salvation.' (Season Three) Don Fernando's group manages to infiltrate Capadocia and sets up communications.

7.title: El Justo
7.plot: New allies inside and outside Capadocia help Teresa collect the information needed to unmask The Brotherhood. Threats to the Marin-Lagos family increase. Federico has an unexpected visitor.

8.title: El angel del abismo
8.plot: The Brotherhood and its foes make key discoveries about each other, which forces the fight to a climax. Each side is ready to do whatever it takes but only one will emerge victorious from the fray.

9.title: Ovejas y Lobos
9.plot: The Brotherhood is growing stronger, and Federico seems increasingly poised to get what he wants. Teresa is in anguish and begins to lose hope. She no longer seems to care about anything.

10.title: Ia sombra de tus alas
10.plot: Just as everything seems to point to the end of the struggle and the Brotherhood's triumph, Don Fernando, Teresa, Héctor, and Italia pull themselves together and renew their fighting spirit.

11.title: La Paz y la Espada
11.plot: Federico is busy hiding a secret from his childhood that has come back to haunt him but the information falls into the hands of Teresa and Hector, as their group is strengthened by new allies.

12.title: Sangre de inocentes
12.plot: Don Fernando and his group are almost completely played out in their fight against The Brotherhood. No matter what they try, they keep getting exposed on all sides. It will be up to Teresa to make a decision that could change everything.

13.title: Apocalipsis
13.plot: The circle that opened at the start of the series is coming to a close. What began with a riot stirred up and is ending now with another riot incited by Teresa Lagos in a desperate attempt to expose the crimes committed by Federico.

1.title: Genesis
1.plot: In the pilot episode of this series, attorney Teresa Lagos fights for the inmates in Capadocia, a Mexico City women's prison. One of the inmates is a young housewife named Lorena whose life has taken a dark turn. Meanwhile, Regina--queen of the prison mafia--faces off with her former underling Bambi.

2.title: Exodo
2.plot: The extraordinary beauty of an inmate known as 'The Colombian' lands her under the control of Bambi. Meanwhile, a frivolous fashion show officially kicks off the production of Captive lingerie.

3.title: El sacrificio
3.plot: Sofia makes a decision that gets her in big trouble. Meanwhile, a fight erupts in Capadocia leading to conflicts between Teresa and the security chief, Isabel.

4.title: Mater dolorosa
4.plot: The prison welcomes Marion, a virtuous nun caught carrying cocaine. Elsa, an inmate separated from her newborn son, goes deeper into depression. Magos tells Lorena her story of poisoning her small children to save them from a living hell. Outside, Teresa has her own family troubles. And the prison's Mother's Day party sees an astonishing end.

5.title: Hijo prodigo
5.plot: Antonia is a transsexual sentenced to prison in a male penitentiary. The Bambi goes to Capadocia and the Colombian can't avoid nervousness. Lorena is unjustly sentenced to 30 years in prison for aggravated homicide.

6.title: El angel caído
6.plot: A kidnapping leads lovers to the prison. The Colombian's disappearance leaves Isabel furious and Bambi insane. Teresa convinces the judge to re-open Lorena's case, which upsets Santiago.

7.title: Pecado capital
7.plot: A powerful madam accused of white slavery arrives at the prison. Meanwhile, Bambi discovers Lorena's chemistry skills, which could help in a new drug operation. Teresa learns the identity of Santiago's past lover and tells Burian.

8.title: Justos por pecadores
8.plot: Germán killed his wife and blamed it on the housekeeper, Guadalupe, an Indian who doesn't speak Spanish. Andrea visits Daniel, determined to finally give up her virginity.

9.title: El buen samaritano
9.plot: A series of murders of elderly women have the police confused. The culprit is Angela, who is finally caught. Meanwhile, Teresa decides then to put her time and effort into Lorena's legal defense.

10.title: María Magdalena
10.plot: The absence of Teresa in Capadocia is unsustainable. After being released from her first conviction, Lorraine now faces trial for the death of the Bambi.

11.title: La elegida
11.plot: A "saint" comes to Capadocia for not making a miracle to a deputy and with her arrival, unexpected events start to happen. Joel decides to steal in order to rescue Sophia but he is discovered and she has an abortion.

12.title: Perdona nuestras ofensas
12.plot: After learning about the relationship between Teresa and Daniel, Andrea robs a jewelry store to be discovered. Teresa tries to free some inmates. Isabel finds drug in a lingerie.

13.title: Paraíso perdido
13.plot: Season One Finale. When the security video falls into the hands of the Governor's political enemies, the police issue a warrant for Andrea's arrest. Santiago quits as Governor and a candidate for president. While Teresa gets ready to escape Mexico with her daughter, Andrea turns herself in. After announcing that what she did was a mistake, Andrea is sentenced to prison.

1.title: Lo que une dios
1.plot: Capadocia is looked upon as the model prison to emulate in a new plan to open 10 penitentiaries for women run by the ECSO company, currently under the Vice Presidency of Federico Márquez.

2.title: Cordero de dios
2.plot: HD. 'Lamb of God.' (Season Two) Teresa turns to Lorena for help; Federico suspects that the lost drugs are in Capadocia.

3.title: Aparta de mí éste cáliz
3.plot: Capadocia is under investigation: the Public Prosecutor has to clear up a crime that points in many directions, and affects the ECSO, as well as Teresa and her family. The arrival of Valeria, the new psychiatrist at the prison, is disturbing to the inmates because of her astonishing resemblance to La Bambi.

4.title: El ojo de dios
4.plot: Victor Hernandez, the prosecutor investigating Capadocia, becomes a headache for ECSO. Sandra gets locked up behind bars and Teresa warns Valeria: "Capadocia is a black hole that devours anything in its grasp."

5.title: Amad a vuestros enemigos
5.plot: The investigating attorney officer in Capadocia imposes new district security measures. While Federico and La Negra breathe a sigh of relief thinking they are safe, Teresa and Lorena reaffirm their pact of mutual assistance.

6.title: Bienaventurados los inocentes
6.plot: The arrival of a new inmate surprises everyone. With the help of Valeria, the psychiatrist, Teresa and Victor find information leading to the assault on Santiago and the recent crimes in and out of prison.

7.title: Señor, ¿por qué me has abandonado?
7.plot: Lorena establishes closer ties with the Deputy Prosecutor Victor Hernández, who takes her to visit his son who is sick in the hospital. In Capadocia, Andrea and Monse receive a gift that will have unexpected consequences for both of them.

8.title: Expiación
8.plot: One inmate falls into the hands of a drug lord and becomes part of a dangerous game. The authorities want to catch the drug dealer and the inmate expects to receive something in return. In the end, only one side will get their reward.

9.title: La mujer de Lot
9.plot: Lorraine wants to reopen her case. She has fears of the future of her children and is willing to collaborate in exchange for an early release. Teresa decides to trust Attorney Hernandez.

10.title: La sal de la tierra
10.plot: Capadocia is losing its soul and an intricate story of interest and blackmail is woven around the prison. Patrick vanishes with his children and Lorraine will do anything for an early release.

11.title: Y resucitó al tercer día
11.plot: Teresa risks her life and family to fulfill the pact with Lorraine and together they come up with a scheme that could free them and bury the shipment of drugs that is hidden in Capadocia forever.

12.title: La tercera parte del mar se convirtió en sangre
12.plot: Lorraine, who thought all hope was lost, recovers the only piece of evidence that can bring down ECSO. However, she knows that the only way to get out of Capadocia is by being dead.

13.title: Y llorarán su muerte todas las naciones
13.plot: Santiago decides to reveal everything to the public but a phone call changes his plans. Teresa and Lorraine are committed to their families and decide to trust their instincts.

imdb.plot outline: Capadocia is the name of an innovative women's prison facility in Mexico City that was created as a result of political interest and power struggles. Two projects converge there, both as conflicting as their leaders: one, a humanitarian project lead by Teresa Lagos (Dolores Heredia), who seeks to implement a program for the comprehensive rehabilitation of imprisoned women; the other, a commercial project spearheaded by Federico Márquez (Juan Manuel Bernal), who, conversely, seeks to benefit from the prison's cheap labor, veiled by social discourse about teaching the prisoners a skill that will allow them to reintegrate into society. In Capadocia, three central stories are intertwined, those of Teresa (Dolores Heredia), Federico (Juan Manuel Bernal) and Lorena (Ana De La Reguera), a young and attractive housewife, mother of three, who has - or at least the appearance of - a life worthy of the finest picture frame; but one day destiny takes charge of showing her that, far from perfection, her life is full of dark events that will send her behind bars. This powerful fictional series recreates the reality of a women's prison, as well as the reality outside of it; moreover, it shows the similarities between both of them, at times the bars being the only distinction. The series depicts the positive and negative aspects of the human race; life is exposed as a constant fight for survival, marked by personal ambition, with sentences imposed at times by justice, and other times by feelings. Definition of Capadocia Capadocia, currently a territory of Turkey, was the name of the area where the Amazons settled, a legendary race of women warriors. The etymology of the word Amazon is based on the Greek prefix.
imdb.title: Capadocia
plot: It tells the stories of several women imprisoned for different reasons in an experimental penal complex in Mexico City.::Anonymous

_Capadocia_ (qv) is the name of an innovative women's prison facility in Mexico City that was created as a result of political interest and power struggles. Two projects converge there, both as conflicting as their leaders: one, a humanitarian project lead by Teresa Lagos (Dolores Heredia), who seeks to implement a program for the comprehensive rehabilitation of imprisoned women; the other, a commercial project spearheaded by Federico Márquez (Juan Manuel Bernal), who, conversely, seeks to benefit from the prison's cheap labor, veiled by social discourse about teaching the prisoners a skill that will allow them to reintegrate into society. In _Capadocia_ (qv), three central stories are intertwined, those of Teresa (Dolores Heredia), Federico (Juan Manuel Bernal) and Lorena (Ana De La Reguera), a young and attractive housewife, mother of three, who has - or at least the appearance of - a life worthy of the finest picture frame; but one day destiny takes charge of showing her that, far from perfection, her life is full of dark events that will send her behind bars. This powerful fictional series recreates the reality of a women's prison, as well as the reality outside of it; moreover, it shows the similarities between both of them, at times the bars being the only distinction. The series depicts the positive and negative aspects of the human race; life is exposed as a constant fight for survival, marked by personal ambition, with sentences imposed at times by justice, and other times by feelings. Definition of _Capadocia_ (qv) _Capadocia_ (qv), currently a territory of Turkey, was the name of the area where the Amazons settled, a legendary race of women warriors. The etymology of the word Amazon is based on the Greek prefix.::HBO Latin America
